name: Cowboy Duel
description:
Play the downloadable version for the best experience.

Small game made in 2 days because a friend told me I talk too much about making games but never actually make any.

Player 1 acts with Z, Player 2 with M.
Be patient so your gun doesn't get jammed and you can aim better.

Tools used:

  • Godot Engine 3.2
  • Aseprite
  • Audacity
